title: Ice Age National Scenic Trail: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices              Our Staff & Offices          The Ice Age National Scenic Trail, National Park Service Office is located in Madison, Wisconsin. John Madden, Superintendent  Pam Schuler, Trail Manager  Rachel Acker, Administrative Officer  Mary Tano, Outdoor Recreation Planner  Dee Finnegan, GIS Specialist  Karen Kroll, Administrative Clerk  Staff can be contacted: By Email Ice Age National Scenic Trail By Mail 700 Rayovac Drive Suite 100 Madison, Wisconsin  53711 By Phone 608-441-5610 By Fax 608-441-5606
